strategy: Dark Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Wraithkind Kabal and Harleqin formations, as well as the Wych Cult and Tormentor Titan formations, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Kabal of the Wraithkind, with Harlequin Allies from the Masque of the Midnight Sorrow.

formations.name: 1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Dark Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Wraithkind Kabals
sections.description: The army must contain one Black Heart Coterie

formations.name: 1 Wraithkind Coterie
formations.units: One Arcon in a unit of Incubi, three Incubi

formations.name: Wraithkind Syndicate
extraUnits: Add one Dracon to a unit of Warriors: 25 points

sections.name: Wraithkind Partisans
sections.description: Up to one Wraithkind Partisans for each Wraithkind Kabal

formations.name: Reaver Gang
extraUnits: Add up to two Reaver Jet Bikes: 25 points each

formations.name: Wych Cult
extraUnits: Add two Wyches, one Raider: 50 points

sections.name: Masque of the Midnight Sorrow Saedaths
sections.description: Up to one Midnight Sorrow Saedath for each Wraithkind Kabal

formations.name: Cegorach's Escape
formations.units: One Harleqin Avatar, two Harlequin Troupes, one Death Jesters, three Starweavers

formations.name: Asuryan's Wager
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, one Harlequin Troupe, three Death Jesters, four Starweavers

formations.name: Serpent's Blood
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, four Skyweavers, three Voidweavers

formations.name: Cegorach's Revenge
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, two Harlequin Troupes, two Death Jesters, four Starweavers, three Skyweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Devourer's Feast
formations.units: One Master Mime, one Solitaire, eight Mimes

formations.name: 0-1 Isha's Tears
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, one Shadowseer, two Harlequin Troupes, four Death Jesters, six Starweavers

sections.name: Commorragh Navy & War Engines
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Commorragh Navy and War Engine formations

upgrades.title: Wraithkind Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Ravagers
items.description: Add up to two Dark Eldar Ravagers

items.name: Warp Beasts
items.description: Add up to two Warp Beasts

items.name: (0-1 in the army) Portable Webway
items.description: Add a Portable Webway Portal to an Archon, Dracon, Succubus or Haemonculus Ancient character. This Portable Webway may be used once in a game. After the character's formation (or the formation carrying it) completes an action you may place a small barrage template marker completely within 15cm of the character's unit (or the unit carrying it) and outside any enemy zones of control. This marker counts as a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way. Remove this Webway Portal marker in the End Phase of the turn before any rallying.

items.name: Wraithkind Transport
items.description: Any combination of transport options may be taken to transport a formation, as long as no vehicle has an empty transport slot, but not all units in a formation require a transport vehicle. Transport options selected may only transport units from the same formation.
